description: As a Website Developer at Hashlogics, I contribute to end-to-end development of scalable web applications. My role involves designing responsive user interfaces, implementing secure workflows, and integrating APIs to deliver high-performing solutions. I collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure client requirements are met with efficiency and innovation.

At Highbit Technologies, I worked as a React.js Developer on diverse client projects, focusing on building dynamic, user-centric web applications. My responsibilities included developing reusable components, integrating APIs, and ensuring responsive and scalable front-end solutions. I also optimized applications for performance and collaborated with design teams to deliver seamless user experiences.

During my internship at Agentech, I gained practical experience in front-end development using React.js. I contributed to building interactive user interfaces, optimized components for performance, and assisted senior developers in delivering client-focused web solutions. This role strengthened my fundamentals in modern JavaScript frameworks and agile collaboration.

company: Khwaja Fareed University of Engineering and Information Technology
description: I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from KFUEIT, where I built a solid foundation in core computer science principles, including algorithms, databases, and software engineering. My academic journey sparked a strong interest in web development and inspired me to pursue a career in modern web technologies.
